title: Console
content:
This article is a stub. You can help the Rust Wiki by expanding it.
The console allows the use of several commands. Rust and Legacy have separate commands, one won't work for the other.
The console is accessed by pressing F1.
See Console Commands for a list of commands.
For more examples see this website
